title: Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive (CSRD) - GHG Inventory
requirement: Companies must report a GHG inventory covering Scopes 1-3 and disclose methodology and assumptions.
notes: Ensure quantitative scope coverage and methodology transparency.

title: EU Taxonomy - Technical Screening Criteria Evidence
requirement: For taxonomy-eligible activities, provide technical screening criteria evidence and quantitative metrics where applicable.
notes: Collect CapEx/OpEx evidence and technical criteria documents.

title: CSRD - Double Materiality
requirement: Perform double materiality assessment (financial + impact) and publish results in disclosures.
notes: Document the process, stakeholders, and outcomes.
